title: High School Character Development Project Utilizing Religious Songs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music appreciation skills and comprehension of religious values
context.additional_context: A process of exploring religious values through creative projects linked to science subjects. Designed with smartphone-centric digital environments and limited resources in mind

learning_goals: Analyzing lyrics and melodies of religious songs to derive at least five character education elements
Proposing at least three collaboration strategies reflecting religious values during science project implementation
Analyzing peers' character development processes with over 80% reliability through surveys and in-depth interviews

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
